info.name: Google - Fluttershy
info.description:
this is my Google theme for Fluttershy.
this theme was made on my laptop, so the size for the theme is 1080x540
i don't have a larger screen to test the distortion or misplacement of images
info.additionalInfo:
>first release. v1.0

>added screenshots - after change screenshot was too large in size. Resized screenshot to 50%
